/>
Introduction
This topic contains information on VHA requests for eligibility determinations for former service members discharged under OTH conditions, including
requirements for eligibility for health care
initiation of
VA Form 20-0986
by a VHA facility
EP control over eligibility determination requests
, and
actions
to take upon receipt of an eligibility determination request
, and
specific to special eligibility determination requests involving access to emergency mental health care
.
title: M21-1, Part XIII, Subpart i, Chapter 3, Section B - Healthcare Eligibility Determinations for Former Service Members Discharged Under Other-Than-Honorable (OTH) Conditions
citation: Part XIII, Subpart i, Chapter 3, Section B
